text: Rudolf Kirchschläger (; 20 March 1915 – 30 March 2000) was an Austrian diplomat, politician and judge. From 1974 to 1986 he was the 8th President of Austria. Kirchschläger died on 30 March 2000 near Vienna, aged 85. == References == Category:1915 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Presidents of Austria Category:Ambassadors of Austria Category:Judges Category:Austrian Roman Catholics Category:People from Upper Austria Category:Politicians from Vienna
title: Rudolf Kirchschläger
